title: Shaco Is Trolling Everyone

embed.description: Shaco is trolling everyone and also getting a double kill with 200 HP! Amazing what this champion can do if fed well......

body: Shaco is trolling everyone and also getting a double kill with ~200 HP!

replies.body: Its a tactic a lot of good shaco players risk doing when playing him. We usually bait a lot and keep our health low to make greed be the enemy player's downfall and trap them. Its a high risk high reward strategy, but now that shaco got nerfed twice its a borderline suicidal tactic now. Either way shaco can get killed in 2 secs from full health which is why we just bait using ult so we have our clone explode quicker.

I walked onto a box on crystal scar last night. It did 900 damage and forced me to walk onto another box, which did 900 damage.

/all WTF shaco
shaco: i dont even play shaco lol

At least i got even with the bastard clown later, apparently focused resolve sticks to him when he ults.
